// src/components/AboutPage.js import React from 'react'; import './AboutPage.css'; // Create styles as needed const AboutPage = () => { return (

About Us

Our Mission

Our game, "Number Position," was created with the aim of combining fun and brain exercises in a competitive and engaging way. Whether you're here for a casual game or looking to challenge your logic skills, we believe this game will keep you entertained while exercising your mind.

Game Overview

The "Number Position" game is a simple yet challenging puzzle game where players have to guess a secret code consisting of four unique digits. The player has to figure out the correct numbers and their positions by making guesses, with feedback given after each guess. The goal is to guess the secret code in the fewest attempts possible.

How the Game Works

- Two players compete against each other. - Each player has a secret code. - Players take turns guessing each other's secret code. - After each guess, feedback is provided on how many numbers are correct and how many are in the correct position. - The player who guesses the secret code first wins the game.

Meet the Creators

Our team consists of a group of passionate developers and designers who wanted to create an interactive game that could be both fun and mentally stimulating. We hope you enjoy playing and challenge your friends to beat your scores!

Our Vision

We aim to build a strong community around this game where players can constantly challenge each other and improve their skills. With time, we hope to expand the game with additional features, new puzzles, and even more engaging modes. Stay tuned for future updates!

Contact Us

Have questions or feedback? Reach out to us at: support@numberposition.com.

); }; export default AboutPage;
